message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $10,000. Would $11,000 be acceptable?
